chunk:
Be Green Bath & Body Blemish Defense

Brand: Be Green Bath & Body

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Hydrosol Water, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (

arinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil.

Directions: Shake well. Apply as needed to blemishes.
